de.esoco.lib.app

Class RestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.app.Application
        • de.esoco.lib.app.Service
          • de.esoco.lib.app.RestService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stoppable, org.obrel.core.Relatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModificationSyncService

    public abstract class RestService
extends Service
    A service subclass that is only based on the REST service implementation of the Service class.
